name: cljs-shrinkwrap
description: Shrinkwrap ClojureScript nbb scripts into executables that only depend on the Node binary without installing deps.
author: Chris McCormick <chis@mccormick.cx>

scripts.prepublishOnly: jq --argjson files "$(git ls-files | jq -R . | jq -s .)" '.files = $files' package.json > .package-tmp.json && mv .package-tmp.json package.json
